name: Lost In A Place That Doesn't Exist
name_original: Lost In A Place That Doesn't Exist
description:
This game has more than a handful of things to interact with as you explore the bus station and surrounding area.. There are four buildings, but only two are enterable. There are two endings.

Controls: WASD for movement. E for interaction.

I initially was working on this as a limited experience for for the Liminal Space Jam ( https://itch.io/jam/limjam ), but as I worked on it, I added more little random things to look at and interact with and gave it an end-goal. 

I also submitted it to the Open World Jam ( https://itch.io/jam/gt-open-world-jam ). I learned a lot from this in terms of Open World game design.

This game was worked on from July 1, 2022 - July 11, 2022

I made this with CopperCube and used the "Do Something Later" Add-on.  I used three Gameboy-like colors, which I found the specific palette listed here:

https://lospec.com/palette-list/nintendo-gameboy-bgb
